name: Add row to Google Sheet for new input from Chatforma
description:
Every time a new user input is received on Chatforma, Make will automatically
add selected data from the input to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet.
The template uses thisÂ [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aJgheYzYpnWi5J476CqFelL2XJMzl4P-eoBZaDE0gI0/edit?usp=sharing).
